item.title: [PI][REP++] How do i stop stop Spam on start [REP++][PI]
item.dc:creator: @SacredHeart SacredHeart
item.description:
@SacredHeart wrote:

[quote=“Anc13ntsIsBack, post:3, topic:401467”][quote author=mistakengod link=topic=498526.msg3645613#msg3645613 date=1309348877]
you’ve to delete that items you’ve add xd.

you can’t delete it in another way
[/quote]
Wrong, all he has to do is delete the system.out.println, I’ll look for it in a second.

Edit:

Open NpcDrops Class, (NpcDrops.java)
Server/Model/Npcs

Comment these out…

Change these

System.out.println("Raredrop: " + count + " " + rareDrops2[npcId][count][0]); System.out.println("Raredrop: " + count + " " + rareDrops2[npcId][count][1]);

To

//System.out.println("Raredrop: " + count + " " + rareDrops2[npcId][count][0]); //System.out.println("Raredrop: " + count + " " + rareDrops2[npcId][count][1]);[/quote]
1.) I know how to comment out.
2.) Thanks.
3.) Repped!

Read full topic
item.source: [PI][REP++] How do i stop stop Spam on start [REP++][PI]

item.title: [PI][REP++] How do i stop stop Spam on start [REP++][PI]
item.dc:creator: @Anc13ntsIsBack Anc13ntsIsBack
item.description:
@Anc13ntsIsBack wrote:

[quote=“mistakengod, post:2, topic:401467”]you’ve to delete that items you’ve add xd.

you can’t delete it in another way[/quote]
Wrong, all he has to do is delete the system.out.println, I’ll look for it in a second.

Edit:

Open NpcDrops Class, (NpcDrops.java)
Server/Model/Npcs

Comment these out…

Change these

System.out.println("Raredrop: " + count + " " + rareDrops2[npcId][count][0]); System.out.println("Raredrop: " + count + " " + rareDrops2[npcId][count][1]);

To

//System.out.println("Raredrop: " + count + " " + rareDrops2[npcId][count][0]); //System.out.println("Raredrop: " + count + " " + rareDrops2[npcId][count][1]);

Read full topic
